tier.tier-desc: The bastard sword, or hand and a half sword, so named due to it being larger than a longsword but not quite a greatsword, is a slightly quicker, more agile version of its larger manifestation, the two-handed greatsword.

A massive two-handed axe with two crescent moon bronze blades, designed for devastating sweeping attacks.
